entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING ENDED, Belleville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:11 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 7:46 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the afternoon. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 7:46 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 7:46 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
